website_summaries.verdict: This mineral-based sunscreen is specially formulated for baby's delicate skin, but works just as well for the whole family. Great value for money if you have kids of different ages.
pros: Dermatologist tested and approved for sensitive skin
Stamped with the Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance
Zinc oxide formula offers broad spectrum sun protection with an SPF of 50
Water resistant for up to 80 minutes
Gentle formula won't sting the eyes
cons: Despite having a non-greasy feel, it may leave a white film

customer_reviews.text: Received the product on July 6, 2019 and has an expiration date of 09/2019. I like to buy sunscreen with an expiration date of at least 8 months to a year out. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: mindful momma

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well rated by EWG
customer_reviews.text: I am very mindful about the products I use on my child. The Environmental Wellness Group rates this product well for its ingredients and effectiveness. It works well for my family to keep baby’s skin safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tin

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen for my son. It is thick and tough to rub in, though.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sunscreen for sensitive skin. My daughter would tear up from all the regular sunscreens, but this works great. Makes it easier for face application as well. Goes on pretty white and a little hard to spread, but it works well and we've had no sensitivity issues at all! Only other she could use was Badger which was very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: flutacious7

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not super easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! The stick is a little hard to apply though because it's not very smooth to apply so it takes a few strokes to get it on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: The Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with the application of this product. I ended up purchasing an actual lotion.

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Pure & Free Baby Mineral Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 & Zinc Oxide, Water-Resistant, Hypoallergenic & Tear-Free Baby Sunscreen, Paraben-Free, Dye-Free, 3 fl. oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:SPF 50 Lotion| Size:3 fl. Oz (Pack of 3 bottles)Help protect your baby's skin against harmful UV rays and prevent sunburn with Neutrogena Pure & Free Baby Mineral Sunscreen Lotion with SPF 50. Formulated specifically for baby's delicate skin, this dermatologist-tested baby sunscreen lotion features a naturally sourced 100% zinc oxide sunscreen active ingredient formula that offers superior Broad Spectrum SPF 50 protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays. The tear-free sunscreen formula contains Purescreen Technology that helps absorb, reflect and scatter dangerous sunrays. Free of fragrance, parabens, phthalates, dyes and irritating chemicals, it's safe for use on baby's sensitive skin and has been awarded the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance. From the #1 dermatologist-recommended suncare brand, our hypoallergenic baby zinc sunscreen is water-resistant for 80 minutes. Apply to baby before sun exposure and help protect their skin during outdoor activities like biking, hiking or taking a walk with the family.
